ornament.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a small object that you keep in your house because it is beautiful rather than useful
ornament.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a shelf covered with books and ornaments
ornament.translation[0].definitions[1].d: decoration that is added to something
ornament.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The building style is plain, with very little ornament.
The coins were only ever used for ornament, not as currency.
